channel.title: CSS Box Model on FEWD
channel.description: Recent content in CSS Box Model on FEWD

item.title: Agenda
item.description: Discuss how CSS Cascades Box Model Code Along: Tags & Boxes Lab: Fashion Blog

item.title: Code Along - Tags and Boxes
item.description: Code Along: Tags & Boxes Using Atom, open the folder called tags_boxes in your lesson_06_files folder. You will be using these files as starting off point. As a class, we’ll walk through seeing examples of the box model in action

item.title: Code Along - Notifications
item.description: Code Along: Notifications Using Atom, open the folder called notifications in your lesson_06_files folder. You will be using these files as starting off point. As a class, we’ll see examples of using classes and ids to style notifications that are often used to provide contextual information to users within an application

item.title: Lab - Fashion Blog
item.description: Lab: Fashion Blog Work in teams to finish the fictional developer’s site by building out their portfolio page (depicted in the image below) Timebox: 40 mins Using Atom, open the folder called fashion_blog in your lesson_06_files folder. You will be using these files as starting off point. Before you start building: Draw a wireframe of the layout to help you plan your approach
